tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE security_system_maintenance (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_name VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
  maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
  maintenance_description TEXT
);

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
  maintenance_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  system_id INT,
  maintenance_date DATE,
  details TEXT,
  FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES SecuritySystems(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE SecuritySystemMaintenanceHistory (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50),
    technician_id INT,
    cost DECIMAL(10, 2)
);

CREATE TABLE SecuritySystems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_name VARCHAR(50),
    installation_date DATE,
    warranty_status BOOLEAN,
    location VARCHAR(100)
);

CREATE TABLE security_systems (
    system_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    installation_date DATE,
    maintenance_staff_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    repair_description VARCHAR,
    UNIQUE(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_staff (
    staff_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    staff_name VARCHAR,
    staff_position VARCHAR,
    contact_number VARCHAR,
    hire_date DATE
);

CREATE TABLE repair_history (
    repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_type VARCHAR,
    repair_cost DECIMAL,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES security_systems(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE service_areas (
    area_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    area_name VARCHAR,
    zip_code VARCHAR,
    supervisor_id INT,
    FOREIGN KEY (supervisor_id) REFERENCES maintenance_staff(staff_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_description TEXT,
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES security_systems(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE repair_records (
    repair_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    system_id INT,
    repair_date DATE,
    repair_description TEXT,
    repair_cost DECIMAL(10, 2),
    FOREIGN KEY (system_id) REFERENCES security_systems(system_id)
);

CREATE TABLE maintenance_assignments (
    maintenance_record_id INT,
    technician_id INT,
    assignment_date DATE,
    completion_date DATE,
    FOREIGN KEY (maintenance_record_id) REFERENCES maintenance_records(record_id),
    FOREIGN KEY (technician_id) REFERENCES technicians(technician_id)
);
